Class ErsapShell.Builder

    ErsapShell
    public static class ErsapShell.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps configuring and creating a new ErsapShell.

      • withRunSubCommand

        public ErsapShell.Builder withRunSubCommand​(CommandFactory factory)
        Adds a new subcommand to the run builtin command. This new subcommand cannot have the same name as one of the default subcommands.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to create the subcommand
        Returns:
        this builder

                                             java.lang.String description,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> command)
        Adds a new builtin command to the ERSAP shell session. This new command cannot have the same name as one of the default builtin commands.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command
        description - the help description for the command
        command - the list containing the program and its arguments
        Returns:
